item.title: Unable to set the fill color for markup polygon
item.description: Details Overview when drawing a markup polygon with styles other than solid, the fill color would be black constantly in the viewer no matter what color you set. Solution This is expected behavior. Unfortunately changing the color for the ‘Fill Style’ other than ‘Solid’ is not supported by ESRI’s Javascript API. https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/3/jsapi/simplefillsymbol-amd.html The ‘color’ property under the ‘Property Details’ states that this only applies with the SimpleFillSymbol.style = ‘STYLE_SOLID’.

item.title: Moving saved Projects Between Sites
item.description: Information Details Overview When performing site copy operation, the saved projects would be missing in newly copied site. For by default, the projects associated with the specific site. So it would be necessary to modify the documents binding site. Solution Find the tool “Elasticsearch.Manager.exe” in below address: c:\Program Files\Latitude Geographics\Geocortex Core\Diagnostics\Manager for Elasticsearch Connect the core service. Find the “docs_geocortex_essentials_users_documents” in the left panel tree and click “document” In the right panel could see all the document in this server
